scripts.postinstall: echo "All dependencies were installed sucessfully ✅ You can now run tests by typing: npm test"
scripts.clean: echo "❌ Cleaning the reports and downloads folders" && rimraf ./allure-report/* && rimraf ./allure-results/* && rimraf test-results/* && echo "✅ All reports folders cleaned!"
scripts.posttest: echo "⌚ Saving the allure report" && allure generate --clean && node ./node_modules/allure-single-html-file-js/combine.js ./allure-report && echo "⌚ Allure report saved in allure-report folder"
scripts.format: echo Formatting the code ⌛ && prettier --write ./tests/**/*.js && echo "✅ Code formatted, ready to commit!"
scripts.lint: echo Linting the code ⌛ && eslint ./**/*.js --fix && echo "✅ Code linted, ready to commit!"
